name: Pew-Invaders
description:
Save The Planet at Whatever Cost!

You are in control of a spaceship with one simple task, protect the the planet. But you will quickly find out that astroids are coming to destroy it.  Shoot the astroids to try and avoid the destruction of the planet.

Controls       

Mouse - To look around

W- Accellerate

Left click/ space bar- Shoot missiles

A & D- Glide left and right

S- Decelerate
                                                                                                                                  

At the moment my high score is 140, comment down below what your high score is!

This is a 3D space game created specifically for Simple Game Jam 4.
